name: Delator
description:
Delator is a cosmic horror puzzle-platformer inspired by the world of H.P. Lovecraft and by The Tell-Tale Heart of Edgar Allan Poe, where we play the role of a skittish doctor chosen by the cult of Delator to be the last sacrifice.
Instead of running away, you must find the heart of Delator and end your nightmares before they end up consuming you.

Explore and unravel the secrets of this town through puzzles and don't let the enemies get to you with the help of your lamp.


*Hide from the gaze of Delator
Hide from the cosmic entity making use of stealth to keep moving forward with your sanity intact.


*Hallucinations
Enter a different plane of reality to engage in intricate puzzles and where everything is how it used to be.
